text: Robert Snelgrove “Bob” Bergen (born March 8, 1964) is an American voice actor. He is the current voice of the Warner Bros. cartoon character Porky Pig and formerly hosted Jep!, a kids' version of the popular game show Jeopardy!. He is also known for voicing characters in the English dubs of various anime. == Life and career == Bergen is best known for his work with the Warner Bros.' Looney Tunes franchise as the current voice of Porky Pig; however, he has also voiced Marvin the Martian, Tweety Bird and Speedy Gonzales. == Filmography == === Animation === List of voice performances in animation Year Title Role Notes 1987 Fraggle Rock Wembley Fraggle, World's Oldest Fraggle Ep.
